PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-04152019-05-03,  ECCC,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOrder Adding Toxic Substances to Schedule 1 to the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
PrecisORDER ADDING TOXIC SUBSTANCES TO SCHEDULE 1 TO THE CANADIAN ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION ACT, 1999 (CEPA) in order to enable the Government to propose risk management activities for a toxic substance under CEPA to manage potential risks to human health associated with the five Methylenediphenyl Diisocyanates.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0115 Publication Date: 2019-05-15
AttachmentsAttachment
